game.title: Find the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of the pirate captain.
game.description: The pirate captain's treasure is said to be hidden on a remote island. The only clues to its whereabouts are in his journal, which you must find and decipher.
game.reward: The pirate captain's treasure, which is rumored to be worth a fortune.

task.description: The pirate captain's journal is said to be hidden in a cave on the island. You must find the cave and search it thoroughly.
The pirate captain's journal is written in a code that you must decipher. You can find clues to the code in the library of the island's governor.
Once you have deciphered the pirate captain's journal, you will know the location of the lost treasure. You must travel to that location and search for the treasure.
